meanings.definition: A curved iron plate in a plow that turns the furrow.
meanings.sent1: The farmer attached the moldboard to the plow to help with turning the soil.
meanings.sent2: The moldboard on the plow efficiently flipped the soil as the farmer worked the field.
meanings.sent3: The moldboard on the plow decided it was tired of just turning soil and wanted to try flipping pancakes instead.
meanings.sent4: The moldboard of the plow was like a magician, effortlessly flipping the earth as if by magic.
meanings.sent5: With a satisfying clunk, the moldboard of the plow completed its graceful turn of the soil.

meanings.definition: A board on a plow that turns over the earth from the furrow.
meanings.sent1: The moldboard on the plow was essential for properly aerating the soil.
meanings.sent2: As the plow moved forward, the moldboard efficiently flipped the earth over.
meanings.sent3: The moldboard on the plow joked with the other farm tools, claiming it was the best at turning things over.
meanings.sent4: The moldboard of the plow was like a giant hand, gently flipping the earth over in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The moldboard of the plow left a neat row of freshly turned soil behind it.
